content: As a 74 year old "extremely clinically vulnerable" person I found this app invaluable. As a retired systems engineer I find it extremely well put together with accurate data I want/need to see and easy to navigate. Thank you.
replyContent: Thank you so much for kind and encouraging words. The app was developed  by our over 70s computer group and they designed it to be user friendly.  We will be looking to design similar apps in the near future and welcome any input and suggestions via our email. Once again many thanks.

content: Good
replyContent: Thank you for taking time to review our app. We hope it proves useful.

content: Goof
replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the app. I hope it proves useful

content: Here is another app that's been put on my phone and I can't use it to track if I have been near anybody with coronavirus as according to the app it doesn't work in Scotland. What the bloody point of putting this app on people's phones if they can't use it.
replyContent: Hi. Thank you for taking time to review the app. Unfortunately you seem to have misunderstood the apps use. It never professed to be a track and trace app. The app collates covid information from trusted sites in one simple place. If you require help understanding the app please email us and we'll explain in simpler terms.  Stay safe and well.

content: Just got this app and really loved the fact that all covid19 info you need was in 1 place and easy to use great job. (was a little hard to find on google play. An app like this should be more visible)
replyContent: Thank you for the kind words. We are glad you are finding the app useful.  As we are a very small charity in the West Midlands we find it hard to publicise the app that was created by our over 70s group.

content: Very informative
replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review our app

content: Who'd of thought I'd need an app to "help" me with a virus that I have a 99.94% chance of surviving (official numbers).
replyContent: Thank you for taking time to review our apparantly useless app. If you had bothered to actually look at it you may realise there are useful links regarding educational resources for home schooling, help with returning to work and fall prevention advice amongst other useful advice. Stay safe.

content: Stolen content
replyContent: Thanks  for the review. it seems you don't understand the concept. As clearly explained we have gathered together AUTHENTIC content from genuine sources in order to provide help and advice that can be translated to prevent false advice. We never claim to magically have a cure or advice that is new if we did we would be working for WHO.

content: This helps me from the new crona very good 👍 👌 😊 ☺ 😀 😄 👍 👌 😊
replyContent: Thank you for taking time to review our app.  The people that developed the app from the charity will appreciate your kind words.

content: Turns out I didn't need an app for a mysteriously absent virus that has killed worldwide less than seasonal flu.
replyContent: Thank you for taking time to post a review.  Could I please ask you to remove it if you don't agree with the good work our over 70s group has done at our charity.  Thank you.

content: Contact tracing. Uk
replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.  It means a lot to our group and charity  that you find it useful.

content: Great to see all the information bundled into one little package, unfortunately, because the app simply directs you to websites that are displayed within a web view, it's completely useless for offline use.
replyContent: Thank you for taking time to review the app. As new advice is presented,  the only way we could ensure the app is up to date was to use websites as our over 70s  group only meets once a week . We hope it proves useful.

content: I love it 💖 so simple to use and not confusing at all, I love that everything is in one place and from the people that we should be listening to and not from misleading sources (newspapers) x I love all you over 70's that was involved in making this great app x I am 28 and I couldn't of done anything like this well done guys stay safe 💋💋
replyContent: Thank you Hannah for taking time to review our app.  We're happy to see you are find it useful. The Ryecroft website section is being updated daily with latest advice as becomes available.

content: This app is very good .
replyContent: Thank you for your review.  It means a lot to our over 70s group that developed the app.

content: Virus checker (McAfee) alerted to a (possible) malware contained within this app. After reading other reviews of this app it appears to be a false positive, thank goodness other people had flagged this as i would of halted the install and not downloaded it. I don't believe its actually anything harmful contained within the app itself. I would given the app a 5 ⭐ except its laid out like a website from 1992. Great app though
replyContent: Loved your comment about the layout. Unfortunately our team of over 70s and myself are not the best when it comes to layout.  Glad you like the app otherwise.  Thank you for taking time to comment

content: Brilliant app! Very informative and easy to follow. Highly recommend
Easy to use
replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review our app. The over 70s group that helped develop it appreciate the feedback. Many thanks.

content: It's good that this information is available in one location, however please note (developers) that the physical distance required by law and for the best chance of avoiding the virus via breath, is 2 metres, not 1 metre as stated in the app. Sorry to be picky, but this is crucial information. As for the risk of malware, some of the more rudimentary so-called security apps will throw up false positives but Kaspersky, AVG and Malwarebytes will not. 🏳
replyContent: Thank you so much for your feedback. Very much appreciated.  Unfortunately as these are external links we have little control over their content. I will put forward a correction.  Thank you once again.

content: Very nice app 😊👌🏻
replyContent: Thank you for your kind words. Glad you like the app  it has been created with the charities over 70s group.

content: Hi I'm not criticising your app but my avast antivirus also detected that there was malware in your app so I wasn't able to install. Maybe this is something you want to look into
replyContent: Hi. This seems a common problem with Avast only. It seems it's picking up content linked to the word virus. There is nothing we can do about it I'm afraid. If you still want all of the information can I suggest you look at our coronavirus webpage at www.ryecroftnrc.org many thanks.

content: If you download and it warns of a virus, ignore it. You have sensitive settings on your anti virus software. Thr app is fantastic, precisely what I need as I'm constantly poking through all the sites, with this it's all in one place. Thank you for putting this together.
replyContent: We have tried in vain to get the app put on a white list with Avast McAfee and AVG. they won't look at the app as it's been developed with 3rd party software namely app inventor.  I'm glad you find it useful.

content: What is your email? I can send you a screen shot saying that the app might be a virus when I install it
replyContent: Hi. It's because it mentions coronavirus the software picks up the word virus. There's no virus or malware attached. I've  received another comment and once he installed the app he left a 5 star review.  If you're still in any doubt use our website www.Ryecroftnrc.org the same information is available on our coronavirus response page.

content: This is a great App for up to date info, I live in spain and although I am english all my spanish friends can use the app due to it's multi language feature first class
If I wanted to see a picture of the word caronavirus I can Google one . Other than this it's pretty useless probably worst app I've encountered
replyContent: That is a splash screen tap the screen and the app works from there.

content: Great app, very useful information, and easy to use.
replyContent: Thank you for your review, it means a lot to our group that you are finding the app useful.

content: Keeps all links on latest info in the same place with a handy translation tool, easy to use with a clear layout.
Will not open in Sony XZ3
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback. It was tested on several devices. Could you please email me the exact problem at info@ryecroftnrc.org.  many thanks for your valuable feedback

content: Great app, really useful advice. Everything that you need to know all in one place.
Very concise, informative and easy to navigate
Simply brilliant
Fantastic advise and a brilliant informative app
A fantastic app that offers good genuine advice. Really comprehensive.
